Projects.Description: single-board computer running Linux & Android. The design based on a 64-bit ARM CPU and includes 1 or 2 GB DDR3 RAM, 4 GB flash memory, microSD card socket, WiFi & BLE4.0, Ethernet, HDMI & audio output.

12 layer PCB design for High Performance Computing. It has a Xilinx Zynq-7000 SoC with an ARM 2x Cortex A9 CPU and a Kintex-7 FPGA. The form factor is the expandable PCIe-104. Peripherals: 1GB DDR3 memory, Quad SPI Flash, Gbit Ethernet, Micro SDHC, USB 2.0, dual role HDMI, PCIe 1x.

Projects.Description: Small board that connects to the FPC connector J10 on the Librem 5 while the rigid section mounts inside of the phone using the center M.2 cover-plate threaded insert. The breakout board provides UART, I2C, SPI, two GPIOs, 3.3V, and 1.8V; making it really useful for custom projects

Projects.Description: NUCLEO-64© compatible development board for the STM32F7 and STM32H7 series with integrated Black Magic Probe

128 pixels resoultion and a maximum frame rate of 20FPS. This display is capable of displaying images as well as animation. The display is built around the ESP32 SoC, and used 74HC595 shift registers for controlling each pixel
